title: Arabic Logo
content:
Assalam o alikum

Dear Friend i want arabic logo anybody can help me for making logo same like this

my text ; الموحدین  
thank you

author: Majhool

comments.content:
The text is "الموحدین"? Does it have a Roman transliteration (like the png that you attached)?  
And how does it translate into English, if you don't mind?

The ح has no elegant transliteration, but you could have it as:  
Al-Mouwaḥḥideen

I think the translation would be something like "the unifiers".

hhp
